creditline: Gift of Shelly Errington from the collection of her brother, Trois E. Johnson, M.D., and given in his memory
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: golden brown patina; standing figure of Mary holding a book in her PR hand and a tiny infant Jesus sitting upright held with her PL hand; garments on both figures have many vertical pleats; edging on Mary's headscarf and garments are sawtooth; removable base with winged face at front
title: Madonna and Child
